Name: The Lost Abyss
About the game: In the previously flourishing world, darkness has come. Warriors who fought for order and justice are now forced to fight for survival. The world is not the same as before, hunger and disease conquered civilians. You have to play the role of a warrior belonging to the ancient clan of elders and figure everything out. People are starving and sick, the knights who cursed to protect the people turned against him. Put things in order and bring justice to the previously flourishing world! A role-playing game where you have to adapt to the terrain and destroy various enemies, clearing the area from darkness. Arm yourself with a formidable mace and hit the road. You are presented with a huge world inhabited by various wickedness, as well as friendly nps. Move around the world, destroy various evil spirits.
